page.title: 05Employment in Gt.Walding.
page.content:
A survey of 118 males who were parents or guardians living in Gt.Waldingfield was conducted to analyse employment in the survey area. a)below refers to employment within the block. b)below refers to employment outside the block.
Primary Sector a)6 TOTAL 9 b)3 Secondary Sector a)1 TOTAL 32 b)31 Tertiary Sector a)10 TOTAL 68 b)58 Unemployed TOTAL 8 The above statistics reveal that Gt.Waldingfield is largely a Â£dormitory'village providing residential accommodation but very little employment.
